info.title: NetHSM
info.description: All endpoints expect exactly the specified JSON. Additional properties will cause a Bad Request Error (400). All HTTP errors contain a JSON structure with an explanation of type string. All base64 encoded values are Big Endian.

host.description: NetHSM hostname or IP address. For TLS certificate validation to succeed this should be the same as the commonName set in /config/tls/csr.pem. In an Unprovisioned state, this is always 192.168.1.1.

get.description: Information about the vendor and product.
Retrieve wether NetHSM is alive (powered up). This corresponds to the state Locked or Unprovisioned.

412.description: Not locked or unprovisioned (in operational state).

get.description: Retrieve wether NetHSM is alive and ready to take traffic. This corresponds to the state Operational.

200.description: Yes, it is alive and ready.

412.description: Not alive and ready (not in operational state).

get.description: Get metrics. Precondition: NetHSM is Operational and a R-Metrics can be authenticated.

post.description: Initial provisioning, only available in Unprovisioned state.

204.description: Provisioning was successful, NetHSM is Operational now.

400.description: Malformed request data (e.g. malformed time, weak passphrase).

204.description: Unlock was successful, NetHSM is Operational now.
Lock was successful, NetHSM is Locked now.

post.description: Retrieve cryptographically strong random bytes from NetHSM. Precondition: NetHSM is Operational and a R-Operator can be authenticated.

/keys.x-amf-description: Role: R-Operator can GET keys. R-Administrator can GET and POST keys, and also POST /generate.

get.description: Get a list of the identifiers of all keys that are currently stored in NetHSM. Separate requests need to be made to request the individual key data.

200.description: Successful request for the list of keys.

post.description: Import a private key into NetHSM and let NetHSM generate a KeyID. The public key will be automatically derived.

200.description: Successful import of a private key. The response contains a Location header, e.g. "https://nethsm.local/v1/keys/I8mhHYJ1T3uk2lXrwXehVaw9KZzg7K".

post.description: Generate a pair of public and private key and store it in NetHSM. KeyID is optional as a parameter and will be generated by NetHSM if not present.

201.description: Successful creation of new public and private key pair. Set Location header to the new KeyID.

/keys/{KeyID}.x-amf-description: Role: R-Operator can GET, R-Administrator can GET, PUT and DELETE. Also, R-Operator can POST /sign and /decrypt.

put.description: Import a private key into NetHSM and store it under the KeyID path. The public key will be automatically derived.

204.description: Successful import of a private key.

409.description: Conflict, key already exists for this keyID.

delete.description: Delete a pair of public and private key.

get.description: Retrieve public key in PEM format.

post.description: Retrieve a certificate signing request in PEM format.

200.description: Successful generation of certificate signing request.

post.description: Decrypt an encrypted message with the secret key.

400.description: Bad Request, e.g. invalid encryption mode.

post.description: Sign a message with the secret key.

400.description: Bad Request, e.g. invalid signing mode.

/keys/{KeyID}/cert.x-amf-description: Role: R-Operator can GET, R-Administrator can GET, PUT and DELETE.

get.description: Retrieve stored certificate. The content-type header will display the media type of the stored data.

put.description: Store a certificate. Maximum size 1MB. The content-type header provides the media type. Only application/json, application/x-pem-file, application/x-x509-ca-cert, application/octet-stream, text/plain and application/pgp-keys is allowed.

409.description: Conflict, certificate already exists for this KeyID.

404.description: Certificate with this KeyID not found.

get.description: Get a list of all user ids that have accounts on NetHSM.

post.description: Create a new user on NetHSM. The user-ID is generated by NetHSM.

201.description: Successful creation of user. The response contains a Location header, e.g. "https://nethsm.local/v1/users/I8mhHYJ1T3uk2lXrwXehVaw9KZzg7K".

400.description: Bad request (specified properties are invalid, e.g. weak passphrase).

/users/{UserID}.x-amf-description: Role: R-Operator can GET users, and POST their own passphrase, R-Administrator can GET, PUT and DELETE, and POST the passphrase for everyone.

get.description: Get user info: name and role.

400.description: Bad request (specified properties are invalid, e.g. weak passphrase).

409.description: Conflict - user already exists for this user-ID.

404.description: User not found for this user-ID.
User not found for this user-ID.

get.description: Read unattended boot configuration: is it on or off?

200.description: Successful read of unattended boot configuration.

put.description: Configure unattended boot: switch it on or off (flip the switch).

204.description: Successful change of unattended boot mode.

get.description: Get public key for NetHSMs https API.
Get certificate for NetHSMs https API.

put.description: Set certificate for NetHSMs https API e.g. to replace self-signed intital certificate.
Get NetHSM certificate signing request e.g. to replace self-signed intital certificate.

200.description: Successful generation of certificate signing request.

get.description: Get network configuration. IP address, netmask, router.
Get logging configuration. Protocol is always syslog over UDP. Configurable are IP adress and port, log level.
Get detailed system information, including firmware version, system software version, hardware version.

200.description: Successfully verified update image (authenticity, integrity, and version number).

409.description: Conflict - Major version downgrade is not allowed.

412.description: Precondition failed (NetHSM was not Operational or update image is not present - call /update first).
Precondition failed (NetHSM was not Operational or update image is not present - call /update first).

post.description: Back up the key store to a backup file.

412.description: Precondition failed (NetHSM was not Operational or Backup Passphrase was not set).

post.description: Restore the key store from a backup file. Only available in Unprovisioned state.

400.description: Bad request - restore did not apply.
